programme.title: American Greed
programme.sub-title: Making a Killing; Doctor Drug Dealer
programme.desc: A motivational speaker murders to get cash for his wild scams; a Los Angeles pain clinic doctor makes millions writing illegal pain prescriptions.

programme.title: Lockup: Pendleton: Extended Stay
programme.desc: The inmates at Indiana's Pendleton Juvenile Correctional Facility aren't sentenced in terms of years; they get out when they achieve certain goals, no matter how long that takes.

programme.title: Lockup: Oakland: Extended Stay
programme.sub-title: To PC or Not to PC
programme.desc: A celebrity rapper enters the Santa Rita jail but his arrest leaves a heartbroken girlfriend behind; two brothers deal with gangs, drugs and parenthood and a three-time convicted murderer claims he's killed others as well.

programme.title: Lockup: Oakland: Extended Stay
programme.desc: A violent gang member asks to move back to general population, following six years in segregation; a brother and sister are charged with murdering a high school football star, two years after he was stabbed to death on an Oakland street corner.

programme.title: Lockup: Oakland: Extended Stay
programme.desc: An inmate says a bet for two cups of soup led to a horrific slashing; a case of road rage results in a murder charge for a software engineer; after two years in jail, a jury will decide if he must go to prison for life.

programme.title: Lockup: Oakland: Extended Stay
programme.desc: One inmate learns addiction and motherhood do not make a good mix; two other inmates are left wondering which of them is the father of her child; when a feud from the streets boils over in the jail, deputies are forced to respond.

programme.title: Lockup: Oakland: Extended Stay
programme.desc: Deputies respond to rising tensions in a female housing unit; a popular rapper, whose ups and downs have been told in the Oakland media, now faces serious charges; a grandmother convicted of a mortgage scam finds her place in the inmate hierarchy.

programme.title: Lockup: Raw
programme.desc: Behind every murder is a motive; Behind every murder is a story and behind some murders, there is a person someone thought they could trust.

programme.title: American Greed
programme.desc: A well-respected lawyer from a prominent family is accused of stealing millions from the suffering clients who turn to him for help.

programme.title: American Greed
programme.desc: A sprawling investigation into the prominent and powerful Murdaugh family uncovers years of unchecked power and privilege that has allegedly resulted in years of fraud, conspiracy, corruption and even murder.

programme.title: American Greed
programme.sub-title: Making a Killing; Doctor Drug Dealer
programme.desc: A motivational speaker murders to get cash for his wild scams; a Los Angeles pain clinic doctor makes millions writing illegal pain prescriptions.

programme.title: Lockup: Indiana: Extended Stay
programme.desc: A brutal stabbing puts Indiana State Prison on edge; a brash new inmate gets taken down a notch; two buddies do their time together; cameras are put into the hands of inmates who share intimate thoughts about life behind bars.

programme.title: Lockup: Indiana: Extended Stay
programme.desc: At Indiana State Prison, visitation is a valued privilege for inmates, but it can also be abused; it's the most common route for contraband to enter the prison; an anonymous tip has put Internal Affairs on high alert.

programme.title: Lockup: Indiana: Extended Stay
programme.desc: From the most trusted inmates, working at the prison barbershop, to inmate assaults on prison staff, or inmates who turn violence against themselves, at Indiana State Prison, "cutting" has many meanings.

programme.title: Lockup: Indiana: Extended Stay
programme.desc: Alcohol is not allowed inside Indiana State Prison; that doesn't stop the inmates from making it, or correctional officers from confiscating it; in past years, the most common forms of contraband were drugs or tobacco; today it's cell phones.

programme.title: Lockup: Indiana: Extended Stay
programme.desc: Using a form of integration at Indiana State that goes beyond race, the Residential Treatment Unit selects inmates with a history of good behavior to live with and serve as mentors to inmates with mental health issues.

programme.title: Lockup: Indiana: Extended Stay
programme.desc: In a world dictated by fear, some resort to violence, and others become victims, while those on death row at Indiana State Prison can only wait for the inevitable.

programme.title: Lockup: Fairfax: Extended Stay
programme.desc: The Emergency Response Team is deployed when a mentally ill inmate soils his cell and refuses orders; a vicious assault sends another inmate to the hospital; a fresh face joins the female unit, and finds herself in the middle of an investigation.

programme.title: Lockup: Fairfax: Extended Stay
programme.desc: A new inmate struggles with life on the tough side of the jail; another inmate is offered a chance to improve his condition but mounts a defense anyway; a female inmate requires some special attention from staff members.

programme.title: Lockup: Fairfax: Extended Stay
programme.desc: A gang member with a violent past and a long disciplinary record in jail tries to convince staff he's changed; another inmate, once a victim of prison rape, lobbies to do his time in isolation.

programme.title: Lockup: Indiana: Extended Stay
programme.desc: A brutal stabbing puts Indiana State Prison on edge; a brash new inmate gets taken down a notch; two buddies do their time together; cameras are put into the hands of inmates who share intimate thoughts about life behind bars.
